wiki.content: According to Songfacts, Bad Day was revealed to be the most played song in the UK between 2003 and 2008, in a survey announced in July 2008 by the British Performing Rights Society. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: According to Songfacts, Bad Day was revealed to be the most played song in the UK between 2003 and 2008, in a survey announced in July 2008 by the British Performing Rights Society.

track.name: Bad Day
comments: Did I mention my one person mission to restart the "bad day" phenonomem? I mean where did it go? Everyone played it....or maybe it was just me I played it 24/7 when it was released!
Always nice to hear but doesn't play enough :-(
